languages.text: "Трон новатора Дома Орселлио пустовал слишком долго. Манипуляции Великого Регента, кровавая вражда между ветвями одного рода, покушения на мою и вашу жизнь... Все это мне предстоит исправить. И взять то, что принадлежит мне по праву".

"The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."
languages.original_text: "Трон новатора Дома Орселлио пустовал слишком долго. Манипуляции Великого Регента, кровавая вражда между ветвями одного рода, покушения на мою и вашу жизнь... Все это мне предстоит исправить. И взять то, что принадлежит мне по праву".

traits.locale_text: "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio stood empty for too long. The manipulations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

"The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio stood empty for too long. The manipulations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

"The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

"The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

"The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

languages.text: “奥赛罗家族大族长的宝座已经空了太久了。大摄政王那些阴谋诡计，家族之间的内斗，还有那些针对你我的暗杀企图……我必须纠正这些错误，夺回原本属于我的东西。”
languages.original_text: "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

traits.locale_text: “奥塞罗家族大族长的宝座已经空了太久了。大摄政王那些阴谋诡计，家族之间的内斗，还有那些针对你我的暗杀企图……我必须纠正这些错误，夺回原本属于我的东西。”

languages.text: «El trono de la Novator de la casa Orsellio lleva demasiado tiempo vacío. Las maquinaciones del gran regente, las disputas entre las ramas de la misma familia, los atentados contra mi vida y la suya... Debo rectificar estos errores... y reclamar lo que me pertenece por derecho».
languages.original_text: "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

traits.locale_text: «El trono de la Novator de la casa Orsellio lleva demasiado tiempo vacío. Las maquinaciones del gran regente, las disputas entre las ramas de la misma familia, los atentados contra mi vida y la suya... Debo rectificar estos errores... y reclamar lo que me pertenece por derecho».

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家のノベイターの王座は、あまりにも長い間、空席のままでした。グレート・リージェントの策略、同族間の確執、あたくしと陛下を殺害しようとしたことも…これらの過ちを正さなければなりません。それに、正当にあたくしのものを奪い返すことも」
languages.original_text: "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家のノベイターの王座は、あまりにも長い間、空席のままでした。グレート・リージェントの策略、同族間の確執、あたくしと陛下を殺害しようとしたことも…これらの過ちを正さなければなりません。それに、正当にあたくしのものを奪い返すことも」

languages.text: "Der Novatorenthron des Hauses Orsellio steht schon viel zu lange leer. Die Intrigen des Großen Regenten, die Fehden zwischen den Zweigen derselben Familie, die Attentatsversuche auf mich und auch Euch ... Ich muss diese Fehler korrigieren. Und mir nehmen, was rechtmäßig mit mir gehört."
languages.original_text: "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

traits.locale_text: "Der Novatorenthron des Hauses Orsellio steht schon viel zu lange leer. Die Intrigen des Großen Regenten, die Fehden zwischen den Zweigen derselben Familie, die Attentatsversuche auf mich und auch Euch ... Ich muss diese Fehler korrigieren. Und mir nehmen, was rechtmäßig mit mir gehört."

languages.text: « Le trône du Novator de la maison Orsellio est vide depuis si longtemps... Tout ça n'a que trop duré. Les manigances du vénérable régent, les querelles fratricides entre les branches d'une même famille, les tentatives d'assassinat dont nous avons fait l'objet... Je me dois d'y remettre bon ordre et de m'emparer de ce qui me revient de droit. »
languages.original_text: "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."

traits.locale_text: « Le trône du Novator de la maison Orsellio est vide depuis si longtemps... Tout ça n'a que trop duré. Les manigances du vénérable régent, les querelles fratricides entre les branches d'une même famille, les tentatives d'assassinat dont nous avons fait l'objet... Je me dois d'y remettre bon ordre et de m'emparer de ce qui me revient de droit. »

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi'nin Rota Reisi tahtı çok uzun süredir boş. Yüce Naip'in entrikaları, aynı ailenin farklı dalları arasındaki anlaşmazlıklar, benim ve senin yaşamımıza kastedilmeler... Bu yanlışları düzeltmem gerek. Bir de hakkım olanı almam..."
languages.original_text: "The throne of the Novator of House Orsellio has sat empty for too long. The machinations of the Great Regent, the feuding between the branches of the same family, the attempts on my life and yours, too... I must rectify these mistakes. And take what is rightfully mine."
